Class: Player

Player

Class representing a player.

new Player(alias, id, seed)

Create a new player.

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
alias String | Object

String to be the player's name. If an object, it is a player being reclassed.
id String

String to be the player ID.
seed Number <nullable>

Number to be used as the seed.

Members

active :Boolean

If the player is still in the tournament.

Type:
  • Boolean

alias :String

Name of the player.

Type:
  • String

byes :Number

Number of byes assigned.

Type:
  • Number

colorPref :Number

Color preference for chess tournaments.
Add 1 for white (player one) and subtract 1 for black (player two).

Type:
  • Number

colors :Array.<String>

Array of colors that player has played in a chess tournament.

Type:
  • Array.<String>

etc :Object

An object to store any additional information.

Type:
  • Object
Default Value:
  • {}

gamePoints :Number

Number of game points the player has.

Type:
  • Number

games :Number

Number of games played.

Type:
  • Number

id :String

Alphanumeric string ID.

Type:
  • String

initialByes :Number

Number of initial byes assigned.

Type:
  • Number

matches :Number

Number of matches played.

Type:
  • Number

matchPoints :Number

Number of match points the player has.

Type:
  • Number

results :Array.<Object>

Array of results. Objects include match ID, opponent ID, and result ('w', 'l', or 'd').

Type:
  • Array.<Object>

<nullable> seed :Number

Value to sort players.

Type:
  • Number

tiebreakers :Object

Tiebreaker values.

Type:
  • Object
